name: Cube 2 Map File
summary: Learn about .OGZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: OGZ files are stored in a compressed Gzip (GNU Zip) format. By convention, they are named map.ogz and stored in a unique map folder within the /​packages/​base directory of a Cube 2 game installation. They are saved with the files map.cfg, map.js, and optionally, entities.json.
OGZ files are similar to .MPZ and .BGZ files, which are used by different games based on the Cube 2 engine.
You can use OGZ-Editor, a free, web-based tool, to write your own OGZ files. To learn more, visit OGZ-Editor's website.

instructions: You can open an OGZ file in Cube 2: Sauerbraten (cross-platform) using the /map command.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
